markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Paralytic Shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2285)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A two-pronged metal rod, this wand has a handle coated in thick rubber. Each prong ends in a copper coil. When Activated, the wand produces a loud zapping sound.

<document level="2" id="action-1833" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _paralyze_ of the appropriate level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 8"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wand of Paralytic Shock (3rd-Level Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The electrocution deals 1d12 electricity damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Wand of Paralytic Shock (7th-Level Spell)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The electrocution deals 2d12 electricity damage.
name: Wand of Paralytic Shock
